Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and faint traces of seven lines of red-painted Coptic text.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394365) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394365)
